title: PHANTOM OPTIMIZATION
details: At LivNsense, I worked on enhancing efficiency in decal printing. This involved intelligently distributing demand across predefined Phantom sheets to minimize wastage and optimize the printing process.

title: OBJECT DETECTION IN MULTIPLE ROI
details: At LivNsense, I implemented object detection in multiple Regions of Interest (ROI), focusing on edge computing and real-time streaming.

title: STOCK PRICE PREDICTION
details: At Galaxy Technology Services, I built a Proof-Of-Concept using quantum computing to predict stock prices with an accuracy rate of 89%.

title: SAAS PLATFORM FOR IOT DESIGN
details: At Galaxy Technology Services, I designed a scalable and user-friendly Software as a Service (SAAS) platform for IoT. The platform prioritized efficient data management and analysis from various IoT devices.

title: GENERIC CLASSIFICATION
details: This Deep Learning model achieves a high accuracy of 90% or above using a Convolutional Neural Network (CNN) on any Image dataset.

title: IMAGE CLASSIFICATION USING QCNN
details: Incorporating computation and QCNN in computer vision projects can potentially enhance results through advanced data processing and quantum machine learning.
